Pigeon.Name: Velocity
Pigeon.Additional: Top racer, winner of multiple races

Pigeon.Name: Aero
Pigeon.Additional: Skilled navigator, known for precision in races

Pigeon.Name: Feather
Pigeon.Additional: Graceful flier, known for elegant flight patterns

Pigeon.Name: Thunder
Pigeon.Additional: Strong and powerful, dominates in long-distance races

Pigeon.Name: Rainbow
Pigeon.Additional: Colorful plumage, attracts attention during races

Pigeon.Name: Breeze
Pigeon.Additional: Aerodynamic design, excels in windy conditions

Pigeon.Name: Twilight
Pigeon.Additional: Prefers evening flights, consistent dusk racer

Pigeon.Name: Comet
Pigeon.Additional: Highly visible in the sky, known for its speed

Pigeon.Name: Sky
Pigeon.Additional: Flies at great heights, excels in high-altitude races

Pigeon.Name: Star
Pigeon.Additional: Shines brightly in night races, excellent nocturnal navigator

Pigeon.Name: Luna
Pigeon.Additional: Moonlight racer, known for its calm and steady flight
